net.toxbank.client.resource
Class UserClient

java.lang.Object
  net.toxbank.client.resource.AbstractClient<net.toxbank.client.resource.User>
      net.toxbank.client.resource.UserClient

public class UserClient
extends AbstractClient<net.toxbank.client.resource.User>

ToxBank User client, implementing REST operations on User. Modeled after FOAF where possible.

Author:
egonw
